00001 /*===========================================================================
00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                            MtkDownsample                                  =
00004 =                                                                           =
00005 =============================================================================
00006 
00007                          Jet Propulsion Laboratory
00008                                    MISR

00010 
00011             Copyright 2008, California Institute of Technology.
00012                            ALL RIGHTS RESERVED.
00013                  U.S. Government Sponsorship acknowledged.
00014 
00015 ============================================================================*/
00016 
00017 #include "MisrRegression.h"
00018 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00019 #include <stdlib.h>
00020 #include <math.h>
00021 
00036 MTKt_status MtkDownsample(
00037   const MTKt_DataBuffer *Source, 
00038   const MTKt_DataBuffer *Source_mask, 
00039   int Size_factor, 
00040   MTKt_DataBuffer *Result, 
00041   MTKt_DataBuffer *Result_mask 
00042 ) 
00043 {
00044   MTKt_status status_code;      /* Return status of this function */
00045   MTKt_status status;           /* Return status of called routines. */
00046   MTKt_DataBuffer result_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT; 
00047                 /* Downsampled result. */
00048   MTKt_DataBuffer result_mask_tmp = MTKT_DATABUFFER_INIT;
00049                 /* Valid mask for result. */
00050   int number_line_out;      /* Number of lines in output grid.*/
00051   int number_sample_out;    /* Number of samples in output grid.*/
00052   int iline;            /* Loop iterator. */
00053   int isample;          /* Loop iterator. */
00054 
00055   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00056   /* Argument check: Source == NULL                                     */
00057   /*                 Source->nline < 1                                  */
00058   /*                 Source->nsample < 1                                */
00059   /*                 Source->datatype = MTKe_float                      */
00060   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00061 
00062   if (Source == NULL) {
00063     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Source == NULL");
00064   }
00065   if (Source->nline < 1) {
00066     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source->nline < 1");
00067   }
00068   if (Source->nsample < 1) {
00069     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source->nsample < 1");
00070   }
00071   if (Source->datatype != MTKe_float) {
00072     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source->datatype != MTKe_float");
00073   }
00074 
00075   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00076   /* Argument check: Source_mask == NULL                                */
00077   /*                 Source_mask->nline != Source->nline                */
00078   /*                 Source_mask->nsample != Source->nsample            */
00079   /*                 Source_mask->datatype = MTKe_uint8                 */
00080   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00081 
00082   if (Source_mask == NULL) {
00083     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Source_mask == NULL");
00084   }
00085   if (Source_mask->nline != Source->nline) {
00086     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source_mask->nline != Source->nline");
00087   }
00088   if (Source_mask->nsample != Source->nsample) {
00089     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source_mask->nsample != Source->nsample");
00090   }
00091   if (Source_mask->datatype != MTKe_uint8) {
00092     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source_mask->datatype != MTKe_uint8");
00093   }
00094 
00095   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00096   /* Argument check:                                                    */
00097   /*   Size_factor < 1                                                  */
00098   /*   Source->nline % Size_factor != 0                                 */
00099   /*   Source->nsample % Size_factor != 0                               */
00100   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00101   
00102   if (Size_factor < 1) {
00103     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Size_factor < 1");
00104   }
00105   if (Source->nline % Size_factor != 0) {
00106     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source->nline % Size_factor != 0");
00107   }
00108   if (Source->nsample % Size_factor != 0) {
00109     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_OUTBOUNDS,"Source->nsample % Size_factor != 0");
00110   }
00111 
00112   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00113   /* Argument check: Result == NULL                                     */
00114   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00115 
00116   if (Result == NULL) {
00117     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Result == NULL");
00118   }
00119 
00120   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00121   /* Argument check: Result_mask == NULL                                */
00122   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00123 
00124   if (Result_mask == NULL) {
00125     MTK_ERR_CODE_MSG_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR,"Result_mask == NULL");
00126   }
00127 
00128   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00129   /* Determine size of output array.                                    */
00130   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00131 
00132   number_line_out = Source->nline / Size_factor;
00133   number_sample_out = Source->nsample / Size_factor; 
00134 
00135   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00136   /* Allocate memory for result                                         */
00137   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00138   
00139   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(number_line_out, number_sample_out,
00140                  MTKe_float, &result_tmp);
00141   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00142 
00143   status = MtkDataBufferAllocate(number_line_out, number_sample_out,
00144                  MTKe_uint8, &result_mask_tmp);
00145   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00146 
00147   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00148   /* For each location in result grid...                                */
00149   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00150 
00151   for (iline = 0; iline < number_line_out ; iline++) {
00152     for (isample = 0; isample < number_sample_out; isample++) {
00153       int rline_start, rsample_start;
00154       int rline_end, rsample_end;
00155       int rline, rsample;
00156       int count;
00157       double sum = 0;
00158       rline_start = iline * Size_factor;
00159       rsample_start = isample * Size_factor;
00160       rline_end = rline_start + Size_factor;
00161       rsample_end = rsample_start + Size_factor;
00162       count = 0;
00163 
00164   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00165   /* Calculate average of source pixels at this location.               */
00166   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00167 
00168       for (rline = rline_start ; rline < rline_end ; rline++) {
00169     for (rsample = rsample_start ; rsample < rsample_end ; rsample++) {
00170       if (Source_mask->data.u8[rline][rsample]) {
00171         sum += Source->data.f[rline][rsample];
00172         count++;
00173       }
00174     }
00175       }
00176 
00177       if (count > 0) {
00178     result_tmp.data.f[iline][isample] = sum / count;
00179     result_mask_tmp.data.u8[iline][isample] = 1;
00180       } else {
00181     result_mask_tmp.data.u8[iline][isample] = 0;
00182       }
00183 
00184   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00185   /* End loop for each location in result grid.                         */
00186   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00187   
00188     }
00189   }
00190 
00191   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00192   /* Return.                                                            */
00193   /* ------------------------------------------------------------------ */
00194 
00195   *Result = result_tmp;
00196   *Result_mask = result_mask_tmp;
00197   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00198 
00199 ERROR_HANDLE:
00200   MtkDataBufferFree(&result_tmp);
00201   MtkDataBufferFree(&result_mask_tmp);
00202   return status_code;
00203 }
